FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI

Class ArtistAndPodiumEditorGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AbstractGUI
      • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.ArtistAndPodiumEditorGUI

  • public class ArtistAndPodiumEditorGUI
extends AbstractGUI
    Contains all elements and methods seen in used in the artist and podium creation/removal window.

    Contains:

    • Two comboboxes that show all the available artists and podiums.
    • Buttons to create a new Podium or Artist.
    • Buttons to edit the selected Podium or Artist

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGUI
        Runs initialisation methods and sets general stage settings, then runs the show() or showAndWait() method.

        These include, but are not limited to:

        • setScene(Scene value)
        • setTitle(String value)
        • setWidth(Double value)
        • setResizable(boolean value)
        • initModality(Modality value)
        Specified by:
        load in class AbstractGUI

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGUI
        Sets the values, alignment and spacing and children on initialisation. Finally, the method setups the main layout, rarely anything else than a GridPane.

        All the values that will be set here belong to one of the following:

        • Initialising Values (For example: Setting the items of a combobox to a list)
        • Alignment and Spacing
        • Tooltips
        • Adding the children (Setting contents of HBox-s etc.)
        • Adding it all together (Adding everything to a pane)
        Specified by:
        setup in class AbstractGUI

      • actionHandlingSetup

        public void actionHandlingSetup()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGUI
        Sets EventHandling of JavaFX Nodes. Mostly setOnActions for Buttons.
        Specified by:
        actionHandlingSetup in class AbstractGUI
